summary: Website project for Orion Star Tuition Centre (classes 1–12).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-section website for “Orion Star Tuition Centre” that clearly communicates the centre name and that it teaches students from Class 1 to Class 12.

Implement core homepage content sections with clear English copy: Hero (headline + short description), About/Why Choose Us, Classes & Subjects (grouped for Class 1–5, 6–8, 9–10, 11–12), Teaching approach, and a Call-to-Action that directs users to contact/enquiry.

Add a Contact/Enquiry section containing a form (student name, parent/guardian name, class/grade, phone/email, message) with client-side validation and a clear success/failure state. Submit the form to the backend for storage so enquiries persist across reloads.

Create a simple admin view (not publicly advertised in navigation) that lists submitted enquiries (most recent first) with their submitted fields and timestamp, and includes a basic delete action per enquiry.

Apply a coherent, creative visual theme appropriate for an education/tuition centre (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) and use it consistently across the website (do not use a blue/purple-dominant theme).

Generate and include required static image assets in the frontend and render them in the UI from the static assets directory (frontend/public/assets/generated), without routing images through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for Orion Star Tuition Centre (serving students from class 1 to 12).

imageRequirements:

- Tuition centre logo mark with a star/orion-inspired motif, clean and modern (orion-star-logo.dim_512x512.png)

- Set of 3 simple outline icons in a consistent style: book, graduation cap, telescope/star (orion-star-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
